net.varkhan.base.conversion.formats
Class Xon

java.lang.Object
  net.varkhan.base.conversion.formats.Xon

public class Xon
extends java.lang.Object

XON syntax parser and converter.

XON is an extension of JSON that recognizes arrays as a distinct type from lists, distinguished by the use of parentheses as delimiters in place of square brackets, and allows map syntax to omit field values, allowing their use as sets.

This class provides several static utilities, and helper objects, to serialize and deserialize basic Java objects (boolean, number, String, arrays, List and Map) to and from their representation as XON text.
